Articles.Content:
I had this thread before the forum broke. This post is modeled of capital ships like this (all credit goes to Macey)-

Anyway, The Vangaurd has solid rockets as anti-capital ship weapons. The Spirit of Kerbin is what this thread is about. The challenge is about earning the most points by accomplishing goals. You will earn points for these(screenshots only)-

+1000 for each capital ship

+3000 for a good side and bad side in the war

+1100 for each battle

+200 for impressive weapons

+300 for corvettes (fast, agile, small craft. The fighters in this video aren't corvettes)

+200 for each fighter

+500 for significant battle at another planet
